In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F, G : function X Y HF : wmonotonic TX TY F HG : wmonotonic TX TY G n : nat IHn : wmonotonic TX TY (fun R : relation2 X Y => UExp F R n) Unable to unify "monotonic ?M1525 ?M1526 (fun R : relation2 ?M1523 ?M1524 => UExp ?M1527 R ?M1529)" with "wmonotonic TX TY (fun R : relation2 X Y => UExp F R (S n))".

original: intros n. induction n. - unfold wmonotonic. constructor. - unfold wmonotonic. intros. apply UExp_mon. auto.
